content: for this bathroom organizer you need 5 mm hook / us h/8 yarn - i use any colour of the bernat handicrafter 100% cotton approx 200m for one organizer gauge 7 5sts trinity st x 12rows = 10cm / 4inch wood dowel 1/2 /12 scissors yarn needle dimensions length 12 with wood dowel but without the string for hanging width 12 with wood dowel
